info.author: Caroline Friedel
info.description: Downloads fastq files from the NCBI Sequence Read Archive (SRA) using the SRA toolkit. First performs prefetch and then fastq-dump. Can optionally use Aspera client ascp for much faster download (Aspera client should be installed).
info.paperDescription: Sequencing data was downloaded from the NCBI Sequence Read Archive (SRA) using the SRA toolkit (version (%SOFTWARE_VERSION%)) [Leinonen R, Sugawara H, Shumway M; International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration. The sequence read archive. Nucleic Acids Res. 2011 Jan;39(Database issue):D19-21.]

param.name: outputFolder
param.description: folder to which fastq files should be extracted

param.name: pathToAspera
param.description: [optional] path to Aspera client to use Aspera to speedup download

param.name: checkPresent
param.description: [optional] check if files already present in output folder and download previously successful. Tests if output fastq files exist, the log file from a previous download is present, fastq files are created not later than the lof file and the log files shows a succesful download.

var.name: isPairedEnd
var.description: Indicates whether paired-end (two fastq files) or single-end (one fastq file) sequencing data was downloaded
